rows.label: qst200208_msg0001
rows.name:
Somehow, seeing your straight eyes
reminds me of my husband[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200208_msg0002
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Where is your husband?

rows.label: qst200208_msg0003
rows.name:
Harghal's father[ML:Dash ]
He was drafted into war and died.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0004
rows.name:
All that was left was Harghal and me,
and the debt.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0005
rows.name:
My body is weak due to a chronic
illness, so I couldn't work
satisfactorily either.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0006
rows.name:
Because of that, life was hard,
and the debt piled up even more,
so I was mentally cornered.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0007
rows.name:
A mother and child living alone?
That must have been tough[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200208_msg0008
rows.name:
Around that time, my daughter started
saying she wanted to do dance,
which doesn't make money.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0009
rows.name:
Because of that, Harghal and I
did nothing but fight every day.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0010
rows.name:
Eventually, that girl
couldn't endure the poverty,
gave up on me, and left the house.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0011
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]So she became a dancer
at Bahn's place.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0043
rows.name:
As a result,
it seems that girl succeeded.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0012
rows.name:
That girl sent money every month
for my treatment.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0013
rows.name: Working so hard for someone like me.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0014
rows.name:
I couldn't do anything motherly,
and I couldn't support
that girl's dream either.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0015
rows.name:
I couldn't make my daughter happy.
I was miserable and
couldn't forgive myself.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0016
rows.name:
In truth, I want that girl to be happy.
I want to let her do the dance she's
good at to her heart's content.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0017
rows.name:
But, with me around, that dream
can't be fulfilled, and that
girl can't become happy[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200208_msg0018
rows.name:
I don't want to make that girl suffer
any more. Rather, it would be
better if I were gone[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200208_msg0019
rows.name: You idiot!

rows.label: qst200208_msg0020
rows.name:
Do you think Harghal would really
be happy if you were gone?

rows.label: qst200208_msg0021
rows.name:
To your daughter, you are
her one and only mother, you know?

rows.label: qst200208_msg0022
rows.name:
You are the only one
who can watch over that girl.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0023
rows.name:
If you really care
about Harghal[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200208_msg0024
rows.name:
No matter what happens, as a mother,
you should watch over your daughter and
live together, don't you think?

rows.label: qst200208_msg0025
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Ah, that's right.
It's no good for me, her mother,
to be weak-spirited.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0026
rows.name:
Even though I must
be on that girl's side
at any time.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0027
rows.name:
When that girl comes back,
I want to properly apologize
for everything until now.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0028
rows.name:
And I'll try asking her
to live together here one more time.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0029
rows.name: Yeah, that's good.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0030
rows.name:
That's right[ML:Dash ]
My daughter hasn't come back,
but a letter arrived recently.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0031
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]A letter?

rows.label: qst200208_msg0032
rows.name:
"There is a big deal in the Old City
of Elgria, so I will be able to get
a large sum of money soon."

rows.label: qst200208_msg0033
rows.name:
"When I do, I'll come home."
That's what was written.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0034
rows.name:
But there hasn't been any contact
since then, so I wonder when
she'll come back[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200208_msg0035
rows.name: That concerns me[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200208_msg0036
rows.name:
Say, you.
I don't have the right
to say this, but.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0037
rows.name:
If my daughter is doing something bad,
could you stop her?

rows.label: qst200208_msg0038
rows.name: Yeah, leave it to me!

rows.label: qst200208_msg0039
rows.name:
With my heart of justice,
I will make your daughter
turn over a new leaf.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0040
rows.name:
Then, let's go search for Harghal
in the Old City of Elgria in Superbia.

rows.label: qst200208_msg0041
rows.name: I'm counting on you regarding Harghal!

rows.label: qst200208_msg0042
rows.name:
I told you I don't know about that dissipated
daughter! If you don't leave quickly,
I'll call someone!
